Namespace: network

network

Methods for interacting with the Network endpoints
https://www.vultr.com/api/#network
Source:
  • network.js, line 1

Methods

create(parameters)

Create a new private network. A private network can only be used at the location for which it was created.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#network_create
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
DCID number Location for the network.
description string <optional>
 Description of network.
v4_subnet string <optional>
 IPv4 network to be used when attaching servers to this network.
v4_subnet_mask number <optional>
 Network mask corresponding with the v4_subnet.
Source:
  • network.js, line 20

delete(parameters)

Delete a private network. Before destroying, a network must be disabled from all instances.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#network_destroy
Parameters:
Name Type Description
parameters object
Properties
Name Type Description
NETWORKID string Unique identifier for this network.
Source:
  • network.js, line 56

list()

List all private networks on the current account.
https://www.vultr.com/api/#network_network_list
